baslik: KARABUK UNIVERSITY 2025 - 2026 ACADEMIC YEAR SUMMER SCHOOL ACADEMIC CALENDAR

takvim.islem: Announcement of courses to be opened on the web pages by Deanships/Directorates
Course selection procedures and payment of tuition fees
Course addition procedures and payment of tuition fees
Entering general exam results into the student automation system
Applications for single course exam to the relevant Deanship/Directorate
Entering single course exam results into the student automation system

notlar: - Instructors wishing to open a course must apply in person to the Department Heads, and the courses to be opened in the relevant departments must be determined,
- Notification to the relevant Deanships/Directorates so that course requests can be made between departments/programs among the expected courses,
- Notification of the courses to be opened by Deanships/Directorates to other Deanships/Directorates for the purpose of merging courses between units,
- Transmission of Board Decisions regarding course mergers made by Deanships/Directorates to the relevant units,
- Entering the opened courses into the Student Information System (OBS),
- Taking a Board Decision and submitting it to the University Administrative Board regarding courses that are requested to be opened despite meeting the minimum demand level,
- Arrangement and announcement of course schedules,
procedures must be completed by June 16, 2026 at the latest.
Additionally; which unit will open the common compulsory courses must be reported by the Deanships/Directorates and to the Department of Student Affairs by June 9, 2026.

As of June 15, 2026, the system will be closed for course selection and closing procedures, and course closing/updating/opening must be done on July 4-5, 2026 for courses that need to be closed at the end of the sub-course registration period.
In case of a conflict in the courses students wish to take in the determined programs, the automation system will not allow the course selection process.
